name: Tank Battle Blitz Attack 2016 - Tank City Warfare Game
name_original: Tank Battle Blitz Attack 2016 - Tank City Warfare Game
description:
Welcome to TANK BATTLE BLITZ ATTACK 2016
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Practice the most unbelievable blend of army tank driving games and commando army games with tank battle world war. Control your tank in this commando jeep cars and tank game and shoot down enemy tanks, vehicles and soldiers to destroy them all in this remarkable commando army game. You might have never experienced this kind of helicopter and tank fighting games along with army tank driving simulator games. Tank mission world war is one of the most intense helicopter and tank fighting games which will challenge your strategic thinking, tank aiming and dodging skills in commando jeep cars and tank mission game. Now you are in for a harsh tank strike ride in the ultimate TANK BATTLE BLITZ ATTACK 2016.

--------------
STORY
--------------
You are the Sergeant of a World War II tank in this free 3D online tank shooting game for mobile devices. Drive your panzer tank from World War and upgrade its destructive powers! Get ready for a shocking tank battle against the army tanks in this world war duty game. Tank Blitz battle is a tank attack war game where you defend your pride against the enemy war tanks. Here is tank battle 2016 game, there are tanks to open fire and rush on the enemy forces in the battle field. Experience the blitz of war in a battlefield of panzer tank warfare. Iron War Tank Battle game is more like a tank shooting game, which you require to target and attack enemy tank.

------------------
MISSION
------------------
Army Tank War 2016 is provided with the latest and most deadly war machines the army has. Now your mission is to rescue the city from the claws of enemy tanks and shooters, ensuring the least possible damages of area. Navigate through the vast lands with advanced controls of the tank, including swipe aiming of the tank turret, detection radars & scope with enemy tagging. Play through 5 intense levels of real tank shooting battle, gunning down enemy tanks, soldiers with tank attack & bombs.

------------------------------------------
LET THE WAR BEGIN
------------------------------------------
A great vicious bang awaits tank strike world war; encounter one of the wildest commando army games. Be the brave and victorious fighter of commando jeep cars and panzer tank game who can perform his duty diligently and take upon intense tank missions in helicopter and tank strike fighting games. Now take a try in the blazing battlefield named TANK BATTLE BLITZ ATTACK 2016 and enjoy the craze of army tank driving simulator games!
